title: Go First
summary: Go First, founded as GoAir,[4] is an Indian ultra-low-cost airline based in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It is owned by the Indian business conglomerate Wadia Group. In October 2017, it was the fifth largest airline in India with an 8.4% passenger market share.[5] It commenced operations in November 2005 and operates a fleet of Airbus A320 aircraft in all economy configuration.
